snippet: American officials believe a recruitment video circulating in extremist circles shows the American who killed dozens in a recent attack, and they are concerned that others will follow in his path.
abstract: Intelligence analysts believe man featured in jihadist recruitment video that has been circulating among extremist groups is Moner Mohammad Abusalha, 22-year-old Floridian who blew himself up in suicide attack on Syrian government forces; roughly 100 Americans have tried to travel to Syria to fight alongside Islamic extremists, and American officials express deep concerns that video may inspire others to follow Abusalha's path.
lead_paragraph: American officials believe a recruitment video circulating in extremist circles shows the American who killed dozens in a recent attack, and they are concerned that others will follow in his path.

headline.seo: Officials Fear Moner Mohammad Abusalha’s Jihad Video Will Inspire Others
headline.main: Syria Suicide Bombing Puts U.S. Face on Jihad Video
headline.print_headline: Suicide in Syria Puts U.S. Face on Jihad Video

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
